snippet: Despite the short distance the store is moving, there is a feeling of nostalgia at Moscot, which has been selling glasses at the corner of Delancey and Orchard Streets since 1936.
abstract: Sol Moscot opticians on Manhattan's Lower East Side is scheduled to move across street after 77 years at same location; despite short distance of move, there is feeling of nostalgia among store's owners, who have seen neighborhood through multitude of changes.
lead_paragraph: Despite the short distance the store is moving, there is a feeling of nostalgia at Moscot, which has been selling glasses at the corner of Delancey and Orchard Streets since 1936.

headline.seo: Moscot Is Making a Big Move, Across the Street
headline.main: Saying Zei Gezunt to an Eyeglass Store
headline.print_headline: Saying Zei Gezunt to an Eyeglass Store
